glsa.title: GPdf: heap overflows in included Xpdf code
glsa.synopsis: GPdf includes vulnerable Xpdf code to handle PDF files, making it vulnerable to the execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: GPdf is a Gnome PDF viewer.

description.p: Dirk Mueller found a heap overflow vulnerability in the XPdf codebase when handling splash images that exceed size of the associated bitmap.

impact.p: An attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted PDF file with GPdf, potentially resulting in the execution of arbitrary code with the rights of the user running the affected application.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All GPdf users should upgrade to the latest version.
